Article.ArticleTitle: Author Correction: Mutations in VP1 and 5'-UTR affect enterovirus 71 virulence.

Abstract.AbstractText: A correction to this article has been published and is linked from the HTML and PDF versions of this paper. The error has been fixed in the paper.
